mc.description: The hit game originally created by Notch. Meushi can connect to various servers simultaneously.

dsc.description: An online chat platform with various guilds you can join, originally designed for gamers.

irc.description: An integrated IRC server that operates under Meushi.

description: A frienshi ushimimi cowgirl created by BlockyClockwork as a universal digital assistant. She features a persistent memory, an ability to interface on multiple platforms, and is highly expandable and modular.
article_sections: Meushi was originally created in 2023 as a kitbot on select "anarchy" minecraft servers, as a learning project but later was abandoned. In 2024 her codebase was revisited and overhauled with the inspiration of Neuro Sama to convert the project into a digital AI assistant.

rank.description: View your level and amount of experience you have.

slots.description: Gamble ushicoin at the slots machine!
